sources.title: Hawaii Department of Labor and Industrial Relations

nonCompete.message: Non-competes PROHIBITED for most tech/creative workers
nonCompete.detailedExplanation: Hawaii prohibits non-compete agreements for technology workers and employees earning less than $100,000/year (effective 2022). Enforceable only for executive/management earning $100k+ or if business is sold.
nonCompete.requirement: Can only use for executives earning $100k+ or business sale
nonCompete.actionRequired: Remove non-compete OR verify employee earns $100k+ and is executive
nonCompete.alternativeLanguage: confidentiality and trade secret protection (non-compete prohibited by Hawaii law)

salaryHistory.detailedExplanation: Employers cannot inquire about prospective employee's compensation history or require that history satisfies minimum/maximum criteria.
salaryHistory.alternativeLanguage: What is your desired compensation for this position?

backgroundChecks.message: Cannot inquire about convictions until after conditional offer
backgroundChecks.detailedExplanation: Employers cannot ask about or consider arrest or criminal records until after conditional job offer made.
backgroundChecks.requirement: Delay criminal history inquiry until after conditional offer

paidLeave.lawReference: Hawaii Family Leave Law & Temp Disability Insurance
paidLeave.message: Temporary Disability Insurance (TDI) and family leave required
paidLeave.detailedExplanation: Hawaii requires TDI coverage providing partial wage replacement. Family leave available for certain employees.
paidLeave.requirement: Provide TDI coverage and family leave rights
paidLeave.actionRequired: Ensure TDI compliance and family leave policies

atWill.message: At-will employment applies with some exceptions

drugScreening.message: Cannot discriminate against medical cannabis users
drugScreening.detailedExplanation: Hawaii protects medical cannabis patients from discrimination. Cannot refuse to hire or penalize for lawful medical cannabis use.
drugScreening.actionRequired: Review drug testing policies for medical cannabis compliance

finalPay.message: Final wages due immediately or next business day
finalPay.requirement: Pay immediately upon discharge or next working day
